title: Aathadi Enna Udambu Song Lyrics Sindhu Nathi Poo Movie
stanzas:
Aathadi Enna Udambu
Adi anganga pachcha narambu
iymponnaal senja odambu
adhil adayaalam chinna thazhumbu

Aathadi Enna Udambu
Adi anganga pachcha narambu
iymponnaal senja odambu
adhil adayaalam chinna thazhumbu

natchathiram natchathiram
nattu vachcha kannu
un kannu, en kannu.

muthucharam muthucharam
kotti vachcha pallu
ye nillu, bathil sollu

kolaru thangam ellaam
un kannathil ottikichchaa
paalaru moththam vandhu
un kannathil kottikichaa

Aathadi Enna Udambu
Adi anganga pachcha narambu
iymponnaal senja odambu
adhil adayaalam chinna thazhumbu

tholumela thookkikittu
yezhu logam suththa
naan suththa, nee kaththa

mynaavukku thookkam vandhaa
maaman madi meththa
ponn meththa, poo meththa

sembatti vellarikkaa pola
siriyendi chella kanne.
nelakottai pooveduthu
naan jada pottu
paarpen ponne.

Aathadi Enna Udambu
Adi anganga pachcha narambu
iymponnaal senja odambu
adhil adayaalam chinna thazhumbu
